mapper.select: select d._name as companyName, date_format(a._createtime,'%Y') as year, date_format(a._createtime,'%m') as month, sum(a._cost_money) as totalMoney, sum(a._cost_money) -sum(_cost_real_money) as disTotalMoney, sum(_cost_real_money) as incomeTotal from tsp_caocao_customer_bill_info a, tsp_caocao_custumer b , tsp_caocao_order c , tsp_caocao_vipcompany d where b._type=2 and c._owner=2 and d._company_code=b._company_code and d._name like '%#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}%' and DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{year,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y') and DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime, '%m') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{month,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%m') group by d._name,date_format(a._createtime,'%Y'),date_format(a._createtime,'%m')

select date_format(a._createtime,'%Y') as year, date_format(a._createtime,'%m') as month, sum(a._cost_money) as totalMoney, sum(a._cost_money) -sum(_cost_real_money) as disTotalMoney, sum(_cost_real_money) as incomeTotal from tsp_caocao_customer_bill_info a, tsp_caocao_custumer b , tsp_caocao_order c and DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{year,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y') and DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime, '%m') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{month,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%m') group by date_format(a._createtime,'%Y'),date_format(a._createtime,'%m')

select date_format(a._createtime,'%Y') as year, date_format(a._createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')as costProduceDate , sum(a._cost_money -a._cost_real_money) as totalBackMoney from tsp_caocao_driver_bill_info a where and DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{year,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y') and DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{costProduceBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{costProduceEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')

select date_format(a._createtime,'%Y') as year, DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') as costArriveDate, sum(a._cost_money) as baseIncomeMoney, 0 as servicereward, 0 as flatreward, sum(a._cost_money) as incomeTotal from tsp_caocao_driver_bill_info a where and DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{year,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y') and DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{costArriveBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{costArriveEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by DATE_FORMAT(a._createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')
